remarks: The definition of "ifc" if "if-" enters the main part.  This is in line with the definition of a class as the extension of a predicate in ~ df-clab .  (Contributed by BJ, 20-Sep-2019.)
statement:
bj-df-ifc $p |- if ( ph , A , B ) = { x | if- ( ph , x e. A , x e. B ) } $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
$d ph x $.
